record.text: 📣 New Podcast! "Top 10 Unprocessed Foods to Add to a Healthy Diet" on @Spreaker #foodblog #foodie #foodnews #foodpodcast

external.description:
This episode from The Foodie Diary presents an article titled "Top 10 Unprocessed Foods To Add To A Healthy Diet," authored by Adidas Wilson. The article advocates for prioritizing unprocessed foods due to their nutritional benefits, such as enhancing health, boosting energy, and reducing the risk of chronic diseases. It explains that unprocessed foods are whole foods that have undergone minimal or no processing, retaining their natural nutrients. The text then lists and describes ten specific unprocessed foods, including leafy greens, berries, quinoa, and wild-caught salmon, detailing their nutritional benefits, uses, and tips for incorporation. Finally, it offers practical advice for integrating these foods into one's diet and reiterates the overall importance of choosing unprocessed options for long-term well-being.

https://thefoodiediary.com/top-10-unprocessed-foods-to-add-to-a-healthy-diet/
external.title: Top 10 Unprocessed Foods to Add to a Healthy Diet

record.text: 📣 New Podcast! "Latin American Musicians Claim AI-Generated Music Is Stealing Their Streams" on @Spreaker #aimusic #ainews #aipodcastnews #musicnews

external.description: The episode examines the growing impact of artificial intelligence (AI)-generated music on Latin America's music industry. It highlights how AI-produced tracks are flooding streaming platforms, leading to reduced royalties and visibility for human artists, from independent musicians to global superstars. The article explores the economic and cultural threats posed by this phenomenon, emphasizing that AI often mimics existing styles without authorization, diluting the authenticity of Latin American genres and undermining cultural heritage. It also discusses the varying responses from streaming platforms, the call for stronger regulation and artist advocacy, and the alternative strategies musicians are employing to survive in this evolving landscape. Ultimately, the text underscores the urgent need to balance technological innovation with ethical practices to protect the livelihoods and cultural identity of Latin American musicians.
external.title: Latin American Musicians Claim AI-Generated Music Is Stealing Their Streams

record.text: 📣 New Podcast! "Why Gen Z Is Embracing Investing More Than Any Generation Before" on @Spreaker #compoundinterest #dividends #genz #investment #millenials #money #passiveincome #stocks

external.description:
The episode from "Trader Suggest" explores why Generation Z is investing more than previous generations. It highlights that user-friendly financial tools and online educational communities have made investing more accessible. The article also discusses how economic realities, a shift in mindset towards wealth creation, and the allure of cryptocurrencies and alternative investments contribute to Gen Z's unique approach. Furthermore, social trends like FOMO and their inherent risk tolerance play a role, though the source also acknowledges challenges such as misinformation and the need for better financial literacy. Ultimately, Gen Z's engagement is reshaping the future of the financial industry.

Violence against civilians is never okay. Political violence — no matter who is hurt — will always beget worse political violence. And it has no place in our country.

images.alt: Mit ChatGPT: Auf dem Bild sieht man zwei Bierflaschen der Marke Quy Nhon Lager Beer, die auf einem hölzernen Tisch stehen. Im Hintergrund befindet sich ein Strand mit sandigem Ufer, an dem sich einige Menschen auf bunten Plastikstühlen und -hockern niedergelassen haben. Rechts am Bildrand sieht man eine Person im Gehen sowie mehrere türkisfarbene und blaue Kunststoffwannen. Dahinter erstreckt sich das Meer mit Wellen, die ans Ufer schlagen. Im Hintergrund sind eine kleine Insel sowie felsige Küstenabschnitte zu erkennen. Der Himmel ist größtenteils bewölkt, aber leicht von der Abend- oder Morgendämmerung gefärbt.

images.alt:
Mit ChatGPT: Auf dem Bild sieht man eine wunderschöne Küstenlandschaft bei Sonnenuntergang.
Der Himmel ist im oberen Teil dunkelblau und wird zum Horizont hin in warme Orangetöne getaucht, wo die Sonne gerade untergegangen ist. Unterhalb des Himmels liegt das ruhige Meer, das die Farben des Himmels leicht widerspiegelt. Am Horizont sind einige Wolken zu erkennen, die die Szene noch stimmungsvoller machen.
Im Vordergrund rechts ist ein Gebäude im Schatten zu sehen, dessen Balkon und Fenster teilweise erkennbar sind. Weiter unten, Richtung Meer, erstreckt sich ein Pier oder eine Mole mit kleinen gleichmäßig leuchtenden Lichtern, die sich schön im Wasser spiegeln.
Die Gesamtstimmung des Fotos ist ruhig, romantisch und friedlich – ein klassischer Sonnenuntergang am Meer.

images.alt: Jena and his colleagues are now developing tools to speed up treatment planning for other types of cancer too. However, he cautions that regular scrutiny is necessary to ensure quality is being maintained, a process the hospital handles through an "AI deployment platform", which can track the multiple programmes it runs, ranging from reading scans to simplifying the system for patient appointments.

He acknowledges this need for constant quality control may deter some smaller hospitals, which might think: "We've just gone through the efforts of finding an Al tool that we think is helpful and paying for it, and now you're saying we have to do all of this extra work." To lessen the burden, Jena
has been working with colleagues at the royal college to produce guidance for hospital managers on how to monitor Al performance.
The other downside he identifies is that "it takes a long time to bring the data together to build new AI models".
", although it is a little quicker if a
programme is using only imaging data rather than combining different data sets, he notes.

record.text:
That is a lot of words when we simply could have done:

echo "9.9 - 9.11" | bc -l

images.alt:
In Large Language Models (LLMs) like ChatGPT, 'use code' is a feature where the model can write and run programming code (often Python) to solve problems, especially those involving precise calculations or logic.
For example, if you give it a math word problem:
'9.9 - 9.11' ChatGPT return -0.21 - which is wrong.

ChatGPT is trying to solve it 'mentally' (which can be unreliable for LLMs). To double-check it, you can add a prompt - try again and use as many tokens as you want. 

To do it the right way, you can instruct it to 'use code.' The model will then write and execute Python code like this to find the answer:

Python code looks like:
result = 9.9 - 9.11
rounded_result = round(result, 2)
result, rounded_result

And we get the correct output: 0.79
This is a more reliable method because the model uses an external, precise interpreter, rather than just guessing token sequences.

record.text:
"Literature Review on the Economic Consequences of the Deportation of Unauthorized Immigrants": papers.ssrn.com/sol3/papers....

This paper does a survey of the Economic literature.

images.alt:
In sum, the economic evidence shows that the deportation of unauthorized immigrants:
• Reduces the overall size of the economy,
• Reduces the number of jobs for U.S. citizens,
• Reduces the wages of citizens, and
• Strains government finances.
The rest of this paper examines in more detail the literature on the impact of unauthorized
immigrants in each of these four areas.

"The Futzing Fraction": blog.glyph.im/2025/08/futz...

I really love this post, it tries to bring some rigor to the cost benefit analysis. It shows how if you shift some of the variables by just a little bit it quickly becomes a cost and not a gain. 

#AI

If the probability of a correct answer is

3

P

H
, because we are trying to determine if we are actually saving any time or money, versus just letting our existing human, who has to be driving this process anyway, do the whole thing.

If the Futzing Fraction evaluates to a number greater than 1, as previously discussed, you are a bozo; you’re spending more time futzing with Mallory than getting value out of it.

That brings us to the “sad” path.

Mallory happens to formulate an incorrect answer.
Bob investigates this answer.
Bob does not realize that this answer is incorrect because he is unable to recognize any inconsistencies with his existing, incomplete knowledge of the system.
Bob integrates Mallory’s incorrect information of the system into his mental model.
Bob proceeds to make a larger and larger mess of his work, based on an incorrect mental model.
Eventually, Bob asks Alice a new, worse question, based on this incorrect understanding.
Sadly we cannot return to the happy path at this point, because now Alice must unravel the complex series of confusing misunderstandings that Mallory has unfortunately conveyed to Bob at this point. In the really sad case, Bob actually doesn’t believe Alice for a while, because Mallory seems unbiased17, and Alice has to waste even more time convincing Bob before she can simply explain to him.

external.description: Recent studies and data consistently show that right-wing groups commit more political violence than left-wing groups in the United States. A 2022 study published in the Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences found that right-wing extremists are significantly more likely to engage in violent acts compared to left-wing extremists, based on datasets covering politically motivated violence from 1948 to 2018. Specifically, right-wing actors were linked to a higher number of violent incidents and fatalities. For example, the Center for Strategic and International Studies reported that in 2020, 66% of terrorist attacks and plots in the U.S. were carried out by right-wing extremists, compared to 20% by left-wing or anarchist groups. The Anti-Defamation League also noted that all extremist-related murders in the U.S. in 2022 were committed by right-wing extremists.  Left-wing violence, while present, is often less lethal and frequently reactive, such as property damage during protests (e.g., 2020 George Floyd demonstrations). A Reuters report highlighted that since January 6, 2021, most deadly political violence has been perpetrated by right-wing individuals, targeting people rather than property, unlike the more property-focused violence of the 1970s. However, some argue that left-wing violence receives less scrutiny, and cases like the 2024 Luigi Mangione shooting have been cited as examples of left-wing extremism, though these are outliers.  Both sides have shown support for political violence in surveys—about 9% of Americans across party lines justify violence against government officials, per a 2023 University of Chicago survey—but right-wing violence has been more prevalent and deadly in recent decades.
external.title: Does the right or the left commit more political violence?

images.alt:
※↓ Below is to the translation by AI


The Diary of a Reijin Medium
 ~Conversation with a Reijin / The Late Charlie Kirk

 September 11, 2025 23:00

KAMIHITO: Nice to meet you. I am a Japanese shaman. Thank you for this opportunity to meet you. I am very sorry to hear of your passing. I know that you were one of the people who worked hard to improve the U.S. to defend liberal democracy with President Trump.
 I hope there is something I can do to help.

SPIRIT: Oh, I see. Thank you very much. Then I would like you to pass on my words.

 KAMIHITO: Okay. Do you also need a translation?

SPIRIT: If you can, please do.

KAMIHITO: Okay. Then I will ask someone else to do it later. Then, please speak.

SPIRIT: I understand that this death was set up. I did not know how it would be done, but I was always prepared for it. Such things will happen in the future.
　But the fire will never go out. On the contrary, it will burn hotter and hotter, and the true people's desire for peace, their spirit of change, and their understanding of hypocritical people and false information will deepen and expand.

My death does not mean the end, but a great and sure step toward awakening people.
　My death will not promote sadness and hatred and lead people into confusion, but will strengthen their true love and courage.
　I will continue to speak. I will continue to speak until this world has true love and peace.
　I will always believe. God bless you and guide you.
　I will continue to stand by your side. I will stand by your side, supporting you with love and justice, and smiling at all times.

　Do not mourn, my dear ones. For though my body may be dead, I will never disappear. What I could not do, many people can do for me. I am not sad. I do not hold a grudge. Because the deceased is not discouraged. Please look up into the blue sky and bask in the warmth of the sun's rays so that you will not be drawn into the darkness. I will continue to watch over you and guide you from another world. Do not be preoccupied with a pessimistic future.

The sinner will suffer and repent one day. They will realize that what they did was sinful, and they will repent for being manipulated by biased thinking. The sin will not disappear. But we can learn from them and start over. Contribute to the world for what you have caused others to suffer.

　I have been received into heaven. I was just a little bit early. I am blessed now that I can proudly say that I have lived a wonderful life with no regrets. This is what it means to be embraced by love. I am not trapped in suffering.
　I hope you and everyone else are walking toward a wonderful world. I will walk with you. Let us laugh together, hold hands, encourage each other, and watch the dawn of a new era.

 From one who continues to love you all

 ---------------------------------------

　I would like to offer my sincere prayers for the repose of the souls of the deceased. And I sincerely hope that the grief of everyone involved will be healed as much as possible.
 Dear KAMIHITO

大切なメッセージを届けてくださりありがとうございます🙇
胸に刻み歩み続けて参ります🌈✨

images.alt:
【神人靈媒日記 2025.9.12】
〜靈人との対話／故チャーリー・カーク氏〜

2025年9月11日 23:00

神人：初めまして。わたしは日本のシャーマンです。この度の靈縁に感謝いたします。あなたが亡くなられたことを知りとても残念に思います。トランプ大統領と共に自由民主主義を守るため、米国を改善しようと懸命にご活動されておられた方の一人であったことを知っています。
何かわたしにできることがありましたら幸いです。

靈人：そうでしたか。ありがとうございます。では、わたしの言葉を伝えて頂きたいです。

神人：分かりました。翻訳も必要でしょうか？

靈人：できましたらお願いします。

神人：分かりました。では、改めて後日になりますが、どなたかにお願いしようと思います。では、お話下さい。

靈人：わたしは、この死は仕組まれていたことを理解しています。どのような形でなされるのか分かりませんでしたが、いつも覚悟はしていました。これからもそのようなことは起こることでしょう。
　しかし、決して火は消えません。それどころか、更に熱く熱く炎は燃え盛り、真の人々の平和への思いと変革の精神、偽善なる人々や虚偽の情報に対する理解が深められ拡がってゆくことでしょう。

　わたしの死は終わりを意味するものではなく、人々の目覚めを促す大きな確かな一歩となることでしょう。
　わたしの死は、悲しみや憎しみを助長し人々を混乱へと誘導するものではなく、人々の真の愛と勇気を強くする糧となるでしょう。
　わたしは語り続けます。この世界が真の愛と平和を得る時まで。
　わたしはいつまでも信じ続けます。神のご加護のもとに人々が導かれますことを。
　わたしはあなたの側に寄り添い続けます。愛と正義で支え如何なる時も微笑みながら。

　愛する人々よ、嘆き悲しまないで下さい。肉体は死んでも、わたしという存在は消えることはないのですから。わたしができなかったことは、多くの人々が代わりに成し遂げてくれますから。わたしは、悲しんでいません。恨んでもいません。故人が落胆していないのですから。どうか闇に引きずり込まれないように、青空を見上げて太陽の光の暖かさに包まれて下さい。わたしは別の世界から、あなた方を見守り導き続けますから。悲観的な未来に囚われないで下さい。

　罪を犯した人も、いつか苦しみ懺悔することになるでしょう。己が犯したことは罪深きことであったことを悟り、偏った思想に操られていたのだと悔やむことでしょう。罪は消えることはありません。しかし、罪から学びやり直すことはできます。他を苦しめた分、世のために貢献して下さい。

　わたしは天に迎えられたのです。ほんの少しお迎えが早かっただけです。悔いることのない素晴らしい人生を歩めたと、誇らしく語ることができる今、わたしは祝福に包まれています。愛に抱かれるとは、こういうことなのですね。わたしは苦しみに囚われてはいません。
　あなたも、みなさんも、素晴らしい世の中へと向かって歩いて行かれてください。わたしも共に歩いて行きますから。共に笑い、手を繋ぎ、励まし合いながら、新たなる時代の幕開けを見ましょう。

あなた方を愛し続ける者より

---------------------------------------

　故人の御冥福を謹んでお祈り申し上げます。そして、関係者の皆さまの悲しみが少しでも癒やされますことを切に願います。　神人　拝

　わたしは天に迎えられたのです。ほんの少しお迎えが早かっただけです。悔いることのない素晴らしい人生を歩めたと、誇らしく語ることができる今、わたしは祝福に包まれています。愛に抱かれるとは、こういうことなのですね。わたしは苦しみに囚われてはいません。
　あなたも、みなさんも、素晴らしい世の中へと向かって歩いて行かれてください。わたしも共に歩いて行きますから。共に笑い、手を繋ぎ、励まし合いながら、新たなる時代の幕開けを見ましょう。

あなた方を愛し続ける者より

---------------------------------------

　故人の御冥福を謹んでお祈り申し上げます。そして、関係者の皆さまの悲しみが少しでも癒やされますことを切に願います。　神人　拝

【KAMIHITO Today's Word 2025.9.11】
~ How We Receive Words ~

How do we receive words?

Each interpretation is fine.
However, it is necessary to recognize that it is our own interpretation at the present time.

That's because it may change tomorrow—or next week, next month, next year, or even ten, twenty, or thirty years from now.

How do we receive words?
In any case, each way is fitting for where we are.

Mina mina ureshi ureshi tanoshi tanoshi
kawaru kawaru arigatai arigatai
ai wo itadaki sashiage hirogaru◯
